body.p: Born in Ohio County, Kentucky. He attended St. Mary's College. After moving to Shelby County, he established a law practice. At the outbreak of the Civil War, Marion was commissioned at Camp Pope, Kentucky as a Captain in Company A of the 15th Kentucky Infantry Regiment on December 14, 1861. He was promoted to full Colonel on January 1, 1863 at Murfeesboro, Tennessee. Taylor was mustered out on January 14, 1865. He died on January 4, 1871 in Shelbyville, Shelby County, Kentucky.
